title: The bun (包子怎么叫)
contents:
Dog goes "woof"
Cat goes "meow"
Bird goes "tweet"
And mouse goes "squeek"
Cow goes "moo"
Frog goes "croak"
And the elephant goes "toot"
Ducks say "quack"
And fish go "blub"
And the seal goes "ow ow ow"
But there's one sound
That no one knows
What does the bun say?

"通商宽衣 通商宽衣 通商宽衣"

What the bun say?
"kui然不动 kui然不动 kui然不动"

What the bun say?
"不强自息 不强自息 不强自息"

What the bun say?
"金科绿玉 金科绿玉 金科绿玉"

What the bun say?
Tiny black eyes
Flat nose
Chasing mice
And digging holes
Huge paws
Up the hill
Suddenly you're driving back
Your fur is white

So round
Like an eval in hell
But if you meet
A friendly horse

Will you communicate by
满脸喷粪
满脸喷粪
满脸喷粪

How will you speak to that
Ho-o-o-o-orse?
Ho-o-o-o-orse?
Ho-o-o-o-orse?

What does the bun say?
"闹的欢 闹的欢 闹的欢"

What the bun say?
"拉清单 拉清单 拉清单!"

What the bun say?
"有神明 有神明 有神明"

What the bun say?
"要应验 要应验要应验"

What does the bun say?
The secret of the bun
Ancient mystery
Somewhere deep in the pan
I know you're hiding
What is your sound?
Will we ever know?
Will always be a mystery
What do you say?
You're my guardian satan
Hiding in the woods
What is your sound?
(Wa-wa-way-do, wub-wid-bid-dum-way-do, wa-wa-way-do)
Will we ever know? (Bay-budabud-dum-bam)
I want to (Mama-dum-day-do) I want to, I want to know!
(Abay-ba-da bum-bum bay-do)
